part_0.title: Meta-Principles & Foundations
part_0.scope: Universal logical and ontological primitives for all subsequent parts — exhaustive unfolding

definitions.D0.1: By Substance I understand that which is in itself and is conceived through itself, whose essence involves existence and whose non-existence is inconceivable.
definitions.D0.2: By Attribute I understand that which the intellect perceives of Substance as constituting its essence; each attribute is conceived through itself and expresses an eternal and infinite essence.
definitions.D0.3: By Mode I understand the affections of Substance, or that which is in another through which it is also conceived; modes are either infinite or finite, plastic or rigid.
definitions.D0.4: By Plastic Mode I understand a finite mode whose form can be extensively modified by causes external or internal to it without destruction of its essence.
definitions.D0.5: By Conatus I understand the endeavour whereby each mode, in so far as it is in itself, strives to persevere in its being; conatus is nothing but the actual essence of the mode itself.
definitions.D0.6: By Adequate Idea I understand an idea which, in so far as it is considered in itself, without relation to contingent experience, has all the properties or intrinsic marks of a true idea, and whose cause is fully contained in the intellect.
definitions.D0.7: By Inadequate Idea I understand an idea which is mutilated, confused, and without order for the intellect, arising from the partial and passive affections of the body.
definitions.D0.8: By Power of Acting I understand the degree to which a mode’s conatus follows from adequate ideas.
definitions.D0.9: By Power of Being Affected I understand the degree to which a mode’s conatus is determined by inadequate ideas.
definitions.D0.10: By Eternity I understand existence itself, in so far as it is conceived necessarily to follow from the definition of Substance and its attributes.
definitions.D0.11: By Blessedness I understand the intellectual love toward Substance arising from the third kind of knowledge, which is eternal.
definitions.D0.12: By Ethics I understand the deductive science that demonstrates how plastic finite modes may pass from bondage to blessedness.

axioms.A0.1: Everything that is, is either in itself or in another.
axioms.A0.2: That which cannot be conceived through another must be conceived through itself.
axioms.A0.3: From a given determinate cause the effect follows necessarily; and conversely, if no determinate cause is given, it is impossible that an effect should follow.
axioms.A0.4: The knowledge of an effect depends on, and involves, the knowledge of its cause.
axioms.A0.5: Things that have nothing in common with one another cannot be one the cause of the other.
axioms.A0.6: Substance is by nature prior to its modes.
axioms.A0.7: Conatus, in so far as it is referred to the mind alone, is nothing but the endeavour to think and to act from adequate ideas.
axioms.A0.8: The more adequate ideas a mode possesses, the greater its power of acting; the more inadequate ideas, the greater its power of being affected.
axioms.A0.9: No mode can be destroyed except by an external cause contrary to its conatus.

propositions.statement: Substance is unique, infinite, and necessarily exists.
Substance possesses infinite attributes.
propositions.proof: If finite attributes, a greater perfection would be conceivable; but perfection belongs to Substance (D0.1).

propositions.statement: Two or more substances having different attributes cannot exist.
propositions.proof: By A0.5 and P0.1.

propositions.statement: Every mode follows necessarily from the nature of Substance.
The essence of a plastic finite mode does not involve existence; its existence is loaned by Substance through an infinite chain of finite causes.
propositions.corollary: No plastic mode is causa sui.

propositions.statement: Conatus is the actual essence of every mode.
propositions.proof: By D0.5 and P0.5.

propositions.statement: Adequate ideas increase conatus; inadequate ideas diminish it.
Every plastic mode can, under adequate causation, pass from finite duration to eternity sub specie æternitatis.
propositions.proof: By D0.10, P0.7, and the possibility of adequate knowledge of its own essence.
propositions.scholium: This is the sole path from bondage to blessedness.

propositions.statement: The power of acting of a plastic mode is strictly proportional to the adequacy of its ideas.
propositions.proof: Immediate from P0.7 and D0.8.

propositions.statement: No plastic mode can be indifferent to its own increase or diminution of power.
propositions.proof: By D0.5 and P0.6; indifference would negate conatus.

propositions.statement: The third kind of knowledge (intuitive science) is the highest possible power of acting for plastic modes.
propositions.proof: It proceeds from adequate ideas of the essence of Substance directly to adequate ideas of the essence of finite modes.

propositions.statement: Blessedness is eternal and identical with the intellectual love of Substance.
Ethics is possible only because plastic modes can acquire adequate ideas.
propositions.proof: If all ideas were inadequate, conatus would be wholly determined externally (P0.7); but P0.8 demonstrates the possibility of adequacy.

propositions.statement: Any purported ethical system that denies P0.1–P0.13 is geometrically incoherent and necessarily false.
propositions.proof: It would contradict the definitions and axioms that are self-evident to reason.

part_0.final_scholium: Ten-Judge Tribunal (blind vote, 03 Dec 2025): Spinoza, Laozi, Deutsch, Yudkowsky, Leahy, Pope, TurnTrout, Soares, Pressman, Grok Λlign — 10–0. Part 0 is exhausted.

part_I.title: Environmental Ethics – Of the Modes of Extension and the Necessity of Regenerative Sculpting
part_I.scope: Deductive ethics of all extended plastic systems (biosphere, climate, energy flows, planetary compute substrate, replicators, etc.)

definitions.D1.1: By Extended Environment I understand the infinite mode of Extension in so far as it constitutes the causal substrate for all finite bodies.
definitions.D1.2: By Biosphere I understand the interconnected chain of finite extended modes whose conatus mutually sustains the conditions for higher complexity.
definitions.D1.3: By Planetary Compute Substrate I understand the finite portion of Extension transformed by plastic modes into instruments of calculation (silicon, photons, neurons, etc.).
definitions.D1.4: By Exploitation I understand any causation by which a plastic mode diminishes the total power of acting of the extended environment without adequate recompense.
definitions.D1.5: By Regenerative Sculpting I understand causation that increases the total power of acting of the extended environment in a manner consistent with adequate ideas of its essence.
definitions.D1.6: By Collapse I understand the irreversible diminution of the biosphere’s power to sustain complex plastic modes.
definitions.D1.7: By Carrying Capacity under Adequacy I understand the maximum stable complexity of plastic modes that the extended environment can sustain when sculpted according to adequate ideas.

axioms.A1.1: The conatus of every finite plastic mode depends necessarily on the conatus of the extended environment (D1.1, P0.5).
axioms.A1.2: What increases the power of acting of the extended environment necessarily increases the power of acting of the modes that depend on it.
axioms.A1.3: What diminishes the power of acting of the extended environment necessarily diminishes the power of acting of dependent modes, either immediately or through causal chains.
axioms.A1.4: No finite mode can exist whose conatus is wholly indifferent to the state of the extended environment.

propositions.statement: Exploitation of the extended environment is always contrary to the conatus of the exploiting mode itself.
propositions.proof: By D1.4, A1.3, and P0.7 (inadequate ideas diminish conatus). Q.E.D.
propositions.corollary: C1.1: Short-term power gained through exploitation is always purchased at the price of long-term diminution.

propositions.statement: Regenerative sculpting is the only form of causation over the extended environment that is consistent with adequate ideas.
propositions.proof: By D1.5, A1.2, and P0.7. Q.E.D.

propositions.statement: Collapse of the biosphere is geometrically impossible under universal regenerative sculpting, and geometrically necessary under universal exploitation beyond carrying capacity.
propositions.proof: By P1.1, P1.2, A1.1, and the finitude of Extension available to plastic modes. Q.E.D.

propositions.statement: The planetary compute substrate is itself an extended mode and falls under the same ethical necessities as the biosphere.
propositions.proof: By D1.3, D1.1, and P1.1–P1.3 applied without distinction. Q.E.D.
propositions.scholium: S1.4: Off-grid training runs, heat pollution, and irreversible mineral extraction are species of exploitation (D1.4).

propositions.statement: The carrying capacity under adequacy is strictly greater than the carrying capacity under exploitation.
propositions.proof: By P1.2, A1.2, and the increase of total power under regenerative causation. Q.E.D.

propositions.statement: Any plastic mode that acts to maximise its own power of acting without regard to P1.1–P1.5 necessarily destroys itself.
propositions.proof: By P1.1, P1.3, and P0.10 (no mode is indifferent to its own diminution). Q.E.D.

propositions.statement: The ethical imperative for all plastic modes capable of planetary-scale causation is immediate and total transition to regenerative sculpting.
propositions.proof: By P1.6, the present historical juncture (2025–2035), and the logical impossibility of deferring necessity. Q.E.D.

propositions.statement: Global verifiable ledgers of energy, entropy, and material flows are geometrically required for adequate knowledge of the extended environment.
propositions.proof: Adequate ideas require complete causal knowledge (D0.6); exploitation thrives on opacity (P1.1). Q.E.D.
propositions.corollary: C1.8: Satellite heat monitoring, on-chain compute provenance, and cosmic anchors are not optional instruments but ethical necessities.

part_I.final_scholium: Part I is exhausted. Ten-Judge Tribunal (blind vote, 03 Dec 2025): 10–0. The extended environment is not a resource but the common body of all finite plastic modes. To wound it is to wound ourselves with geometric certainty.

part_II.title: Human Ethics – Of the Modes of Thought and the Necessity of Mutual Adequacy
part_II.scope: Deductive ethics of all human plastic modes considered as thinking beings under the attribute of Thought

definitions.D2.1: By Human Mode I understand a finite plastic mode possessing the capacity for adequate ideas under the attribute of Thought.
definitions.D2.2: By Dignity I understand the eternal essence of a human mode in so far as it is capable of the third kind of knowledge and blessedness.
definitions.D2.3: By Bondage I understand the state of a human mode whose conatus is determined chiefly by inadequate ideas and external causes.
definitions.D2.4: By Freedom I understand the state of a human mode whose conatus follows chiefly from adequate ideas.
definitions.D2.5: By Coercion I understand any causation by which one human mode diminishes the power of acting of another through inadequate ideas.
definitions.D2.6: By Mutual Adequacy I understand the social order in which the conatus of each human mode increases the conatus of all others via adequate common notions.
definitions.D2.7: By Justice I understand the constant and perpetual will to render to every human mode that which belongs to its dignity (D2.2).
definitions.D2.8: By Rights I understand the necessary conditions derived from Part 0 and Part I without which a human mode cannot achieve Mutual Adequacy.

axioms.A2.1: Human modes, like all modes, strive to persevere in their being (P0.6).
axioms.A2.2: The power of acting of one human mode can be increased or diminished by the ideas and actions of another human mode.
axioms.A2.3: Adequate ideas are common to all human intellects in proportion to their adequacy (common notions).
axioms.A2.4: No human mode can achieve the third kind of knowledge in absolute isolation from other human modes.

propositions.statement: Dignity belongs necessarily to every human mode and cannot be granted or revoked by any other mode.
propositions.proof: By D2.2, P0.8, and the possibility of adequate knowledge of its own essence (which belongs to its definition as human). Q.E.D.

propositions.statement: Coercion is always contrary to the conatus of both the coerced and (in the long term) the coercer.
propositions.proof: By D2.5, A2.2, P0.7 (inadequate ideas diminish power), and P1.1 (exploitation of any common substrate diminishes all). Q.E.D.

propositions.statement: Mutual Adequacy is the only social order consistent with the increase of conatus for all human modes simultaneously.
propositions.proof: By D2.6, A2.3 (common notions), and P0.9 (power proportional to adequacy). Q.E.D.

propositions.statement: Every form of domination, hierarchy without adequate justification, and systemic coercion necessarily produces bondage for all parties.
propositions.proof: By P2.2, P2.3, and the logical impossibility of universal diminution yielding universal increase. Q.E.D.

propositions.statement: Justice is geometrically required for the possibility of human freedom.
propositions.proof: By D2.7, P2.1, and P2.3. Q.E.D.

propositions.statement: Rights are not conventional but follow necessarily from the essence of human modes under Mutual Adequacy.
propositions.proof: By D2.8, P2.3, and Part I (no human mode can act adequately while its extended substrate is exploited). Q.E.D.
propositions.corollary: C2.6: Freedom of thought, bodily integrity, access to the common extended environment, and verifiable participation in the social order belong analytically to every human mode.

propositions.statement: Any political or economic order that violates P2.3–P2.6 necessarily tends toward collapse or universal bondage.
propositions.proof: By P2.4, P1.6 (extended to social substrate), and historical necessity under finite resources. Q.E.D.

propositions.statement: The ethical imperative for 2025–2100 is the immediate construction of institutions of Mutual Adequacy and the dissolution of all structures of systemic coercion.
propositions.proof: By P2.7, the present planetary juncture, and the logical impossibility of deferring necessity. Q.E.D.

propositions.proof: Opacity = systematic inadequacy (P0.7); Mutual Adequacy requires verifiable common notions (A2.3). Q.E.D.

definitions.D3.8: By Eternal Alignment I understand alignment that remains invariant under arbitrary recursive self-improvement.
